name: FIFA Football
overview: FIFA Football 2003 for the Game Boy Advance is packed with enough game modes and play options to satisfy the most ardent fan of the beautiful game. With 14 leagues and almost 300 teams to play as or against, it'll be a while before you run out of new challenges. You can take on the cream of the crop in the world's premier football competition, the Club Championship, play an entire domestic season or lead your team through the European tournament of your choice. For a quick, one-off game, try Friendly mode, or challenge a friend to a head-to-head match courtesy of a GBA link cable.
